WebGL OES_texture_float_linear Extension Draft Specification

Name

OES_texture_float_linear

Contact

WebGL working group (public_webgl 'at' khronos.org)

Contributors

Members of the WebGL working group

Version

Last modified date: March 11, 2013
Revision: 2

Number

WebGL extension #20

Dependencies

Written against the WebGL API 1.0 specification.

Overview

This extension exposes the OES_texture_float_linear functionality to WebGL.

There are no WebGL-specific behavioral changes.

Consult the above extension for documentation, issues and new functions and enumerants.

When this extension is enabled:

    IDL

     interface OES_texture_float_linear { };

    Revision History

    Revision 1, 2013/02/20

    • Initial revision.

    Revision 2, 2013/03/11

    • Moved to draft status after discussion on public_webgl.
